messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6-3-2003 9:09:34 AM Mountain Daylight Time, ... it s avko.org :) diana, The wackiest widow westriver... “I m just a human being trying to
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6-3-2003 9:09:34 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
leschke@... writes:

> >Consider www.avko.com --- costs less and is a whole lot less work to
> >figure out how to do it.
>
> That is, if you want to paint. Must be a slightly different address. That's
> for a paint company.
>

it's avko.org :)

diana,
The wackiest widow westriver...
“I'm just a human being trying to make it in a world that is very rapidly
losing it's understanding of being human" John Trudell


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Spelling Power
messages.msgSnippet: I did the same thing sending somebody to the new girl scout program for older girls --- they are phasing out Cadettes and Seniors -- girls from 11 to 17 won t
messages.messageBody:
I did the same thing sending somebody to the new girl scout program for
older girls --- they are phasing out Cadettes and Seniors -- girls from
11 to 17 won't even be called Girl Scouts anymore - they will be
"members of Studio2b" -- see www.studio2b.org (and not studio2b.com
<G>). for details. No more badges - they'll set their own goals in
their chosen focus areas and when they meet their own goals they can
get a "charm" as a memento.

-pam

----- Original Message -----
From: Tia Leschke
To: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, June 02, 2003 3:35 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Spelling Power



>
> I would like to find a copy of Spelling Power for myself. I have
atrocious spelling and would like to use this book to improve it. The only
problem is I don't have the funds to spend 75 Can. plus shipping. So If you
know of anyone who would be willing to sell me the book for much less I
would love it.

Talk about bad timing. I just gave that book to our local group to sell at
a fund-raising a couple of months ago. It really didn't work for Lars when
he wanted to improve his spelling. But it might be just the ticket for
someone else.
Tia

messages.subject: Spelling Power
messages.msgSnippet: Hello I know this is a little weird me asking if anyone on the list has a schooly book to sell but, here goes... I would like to find a copy of Spelling
messages.messageBody:
Hello I know this is a little weird me asking if anyone on the list has a 'schooly' book to sell but, here goes...

I would like to find a copy of Spelling Power for myself. I have atrocious spelling and would like to use this book to improve it. The only problem is I don't have the funds to spend 75 Can. plus shipping. So If you know of anyone who would be willing to sell me the book for much less I would love it.

Thanks a bunch
Teresa in Canada
